long_term_memory:
Data model:
- Prisma schema: User, Agent, Customer, Message, Driver, Vehicle, AdminUser, AuditLog.
- PostgreSQL database via DATABASE_URL (dev + staging).
- Agent/Customer list fields stored as JSON strings.

APIs:
- Express server in connsura-backend/src/server.js.
- CORS origin FRONTEND_URL (default http://localhost:5173).
- Routes: /auth, /agents, /customers, /search, /quotes, /contact, /admin, /messages.
- Static: /uploads and /forms.
- Agent endpoints include profile update, photo upload, SCC lookup, request flow.
- Customer endpoints include profile read/update, photo upload, sharing preferences.
- Admin endpoints include login, OTP lookup, agent/client management, audit logs.

Runtime:
- Deploy env sets HOST=0.0.0.0, PORT=8000, FRONTEND_URL=https://<domain>, DATABASE_URL=postgresql://<user>:<password>@postgres:5432/<db> (from /opt/connsura/env/backend.env).
- Admin seed runs if ADMIN_EMAIL/ADMIN_PASSWORD are set.

Decisions:
- Serve uploads and forms directly from backend.

Open questions:
- Production DB choice and migration strategy.
- Logging/monitoring stack not defined.

Next steps:
- Keep API docs aligned with route changes.
- Update memory after major backend changes.
